div.p: "Go out into the world well prepared"- Alfred Dolge

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

a.title: Professional Development Plan (PDP) and District Mentoring Plan
a.span: Professional Development Plan (PDP) and District Mentoring Plan

li.a: Professional Development Plan (PDP) and District Mentoring Plan

div.span:
In an effort to share information as quickly as possible, we have developed this website for this purpose. Any announcements, letters, etc. will be posted here.
DCS Response/Practices to Coronavirus - 3/9/2020
Staff Development Day - 3/12/2020
Coronavirus Closure Letter - 3/13/2020
Free Meals Information 3/16/2020
School Closing Letter 3/18/2020
Meal Delivery - 3/19/2020
School Work Pickup Details for Friday - 3/20/2020
Change in Meal Distribution - 3/23/20
Child Care - 4/1/2020
COVID-19 Emotional Support - 4/3/2020
Website by SchoolMessenger Presence. © 2020 Intrado Corporation. All rights reserved.
